General.Name: Shih Her Technologies
General.Description: Shih Her Technologies Inc. provides precision clean and reborn treatment for semiconductor, photoelectricity, and solar energy's manufacturing equipment parts. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
